data.name: WildStar: Hero Pack
data.detailed_description:
It’s great to earn the title of “hero”, but it’s so much quicker to just start out with it.

Level up faster and be richer with a bunch of Flask of Advancement and Flask of Riches. Ride around like a boss on your mount with a special outfit and dye, and get more of pretty much everything with 30 days of Signature status. And then execute full hero status with a ton of Service Tokens—used for all sorts of things, like reduced res timers and weapon modifications—as well as a couple dozen chances at uncovering epic items from Madame Fay’s Fortunes.

Hit hero status immediately, and for less than half of what this bundle’s contents are valued at.

Contents:
Signature - 30 Days
Fortune Coins - 27 Pack
Service Tokens - 140 Pack
Flask of Advancement (6H) x5
Flask of Riches (3H) x5
Blue Equivar Mount (Account)
Gilded Ascendant Costume Kit
Exanite Sheen Dye

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP SP3 (32-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® Core2 Duo 2.4 GHz, AMD Phenom™ X3 2.3 GHz, or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® 8800 GT, ATI® Radeon® HD 4850, or better
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista® (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Quad Core 2.66GHz or better, AMD Phenom™ II X4 3GHz, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460, Radeon® HD 5830, or better
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
